page.title: 02EDUCATION IN DONCASTER
page.content: IN OUR AREA THERE ARE EIGHTEEN SCHOOLS. THEY ARE ALL DIFFERENT KINDS OF SCHOOLS. THERE ARE NINE FIRST SCHOOLS,IN EIGHT OF WHICH THE AGE IS FIVE TO NINE AND AT THE OTHER SCHOOL THE AGE IS FIVE TO EIGHT; FOUR MIDDLE SCHOOLS, IN THREE OF WHICH THE AGE IS NINE TO THIRTEEN, AND AT THE OTHER SCHOOL, THE AGE IS EIGHT TO TWELVE; ONE COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL; ONE PRIVATE PREPARATORY SCHOOL AT WHICH THE AGE IS FIVE TO THIRTEEN AND ONE SPECIAL RESIDENTIAL SCHOOL FOR THE DEAF. MOST SCHOOLS START AT 8.55 AM BUT SOME DO VARY. EVEN THOUGH SCHOOLS MAY START AT DIFFERENT TIMES THEY NEARY ALL WORK THE SAME NUMBER OF HOURS. NOT INCLUDING THE COLLEGES, THERE ARE FIVE THOUSAND ONE HUNDRED AND NINETEEN PUPILS IN THIS AREA.
